fields.description:
Reproduction steps:

1. Launch KS
2. Go to platform > XML RSS

Expected results:
The xml test loads with a list of articles

Actual results:
the RSS XML test does not load, and is a black screen.  In the logs, you will see "(TiHttpClient-2) [9,122279] HTTP Error (java.lang.ClassCastException): org.apache.http.message.BasicHttpRequest"
fields.summary: Android: KS XML RSS test does not load

comments.body:
Closing issue

Tested with Ti Studio build 2.1.0.201206172244
Ti Mobile SDK2.1.0.v20120618134156 hash r00905cd0
OSX Lion 10.7.3
Nexus S OS 4.0.4

The expected behavior is shown
